findings.title: Potential locking of funds due to non standard ERC20 transfers
findings.description: Validate that all tokens in the currencies array adhere to the expected ERC20 behavior and disallow the addition of non-compliant tokens.

findings.title: Use Custom Errors
findings.description: Informational issue suggesting to use custom errors.

findings.title: Cache array length outside of loop
findings.description: The cache array length is accessed outside of a loop.

findings.title: Use of unchecked for Loop Increment Optimization
findings.description: Consider using unchecked blocks for increment operations to optimize gas consumption.

findings.title: Gas Efficiency: Prefer Pre-increment (++i) over Post-increment (i++)
findings.description: To optimize gas usage in loops or recurring operations, consider adopting pre-increment over its alternatives. Ensuring these best practices can lead to tangible gas savings over numerous iterations, especially in contracts with high transaction frequency.

findings.title: Redundant Initialization of Variables with Default Values
findings.description: Remove explicit initialization of variables with default values to optimize gas consumption and align with best practices in Solidity development.
